You will lose control of the vehicle once you touch the ground after jumping!

missions.delivery.intro.medals:

missions.delivery.gameplay.coupleTip: Press [action=couplersToggle] and reverse into the trailer to couple.
missions.delivery.east_coast_usa.watchto: Deliver some supplies to the watchtower.

I've packed some supplies for the crew in the watchtower. Can you bring it to them?
Also, the navi in the car is broken... but you know this area very well, don't you?
Dont forget to bring the trailer!
Thanks for delivering all those supplies!
missions.delivery.industrial.garbagePige: Bring your trailer full of furniture to the garbage station.
Arriving in the area with your trailer full of furniture, find your way on the industrial grounds to the garbage station. There are multiple paths that you can take.
That's a lot of trash! We'll take care of it.
Looks like a few pieces fell off...
Wasn't there a lot more trash when you got into the area?
You know, you're supposed to bring your trash here, not scatter it in the area!
missions.delivery.industrial.garbageLegr: Bring your trailer full of trash to the garbage station.
Arriving in the area in your trusty legan, make your way to the garbage station to get rid of all the old junk. There are multiple routes that you can take.
That's a lot of trash! We'll take care of it.
Looks like a few pieces fell off...
Wasn't there a lot more trash when you got into the area?
You know, you're supposed to bring your trash here, not scatter it in the area!
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.title: Delivery: Mattress Cleaning
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.descr: The castles mattresses need to be brought to the cleaning place.
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.intro: These old mattresses need to be deep-cleaned. There's a special cleaning place we usually bring them to, just outside of town. Oh, you can take all of them at once, right?
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.goldM: I'll get right to work, these mattresses will be cleaned in no time!
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.silve: Ah, fewer than I expected. I'll clean them now.
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.bronz: Thats quite a big vehicle you've used to transport so few mattresses.
missions.delivery.italy.mattresses.failM: Where did you leave all those mattresses?
This bastion cannot be repaired here. Bring it to different shop.
We dont have the right tools here to repair the bastion, and I guess it's easier to move the vehicle than to bring new tools here. The customer wants it fixed as soon as possible. So, move!
You're right on time! We'll get right to work.
A bit late, but we'll start working now.
missions.delivery.italy.tastiCola.title: Delivery: Tasticola Restock
missions.delivery.italy.tastiCola.descri: The people of Citt Vecchia need TastiCola.
missions.delivery.italy.tastiCola.introM: The shops of Citt Vecchia need to be restocked with this tasty, tasty Tasticola. It's a long drive and there's a bit of traffic, so move carefully.
missions.delivery.italy.tastiCola.goldMe: Right on time! There are dozens of people waiting for some refreshments!
missions.delivery.italy.tastiCola.silver: A bit late, are you not? There are people running through the doors looking for Tasticola here!
missions.delivery.jungle_rock_island.pip: Deliver a set of pipes to the Industrial Area.

We've got this big load of pipes that is needed at the industrial site for construction. It is needed urgently, but the path is treacherous and there's some traffic. Are you up to the task?
Make use of the differentials to get up steep slopes.
Great! You're right on time, we will get this unloaded quickly.
What's taking you so long? I don't want to pay my workers for waiting!
missions.delivery.jungle_rock_island.loo: Deliver some unsecured planks of wood to to the old resort.

Someone forgot to tie down the wooden planks, but there's no time to do that now. Just as well. Can you transport them to the resort anyway?
Make use of the differentials to get up steep slopes.
Thanks for the delivery! Exactly what we needed.
Thanks for the delivery. Looks like you lost a piece or two though...
So few..? I thought we were supposed to get give of them?
missions.delivery.small_island.upRocks.d: The research team up on the hill needs their equipment.
missions.delivery.small_island.upRocks.i:
The Rocks Research Team up on the hill needs their "mining equipment" for some "delicate research". Be very careful with it, that thing weighs more than 5 tons, and due to its massive size, it is very top-heavy.
Be sure to make use of the differentials to get up the hills.
missions.delivery.small_island.upRocks.g: Great! This will allow us to carefully extract rock samples from the local area.
missions.delivery.small_island.downRocks: The research team found some interesting samples.

We managed to get a few tonnes of interesting samples out of the local area. Can you haul them down to the other station so they can inspect them with their special tools?
Make use of the differentials to get up steep slopes. There are multiple routes.
Thanks! We will get right now to work.
missions.arrive.message.keepMoving: Get Moving! If you are stuck press reset [action=reset_physics]
missions.arrive.italy.blancoAuto.title: Blanco Delivery
missions.arrive.italy.blancoAuto.descrip: Take a little package and drop it off across the island at our storage shack.
missions.arrive.italy.blancoAuto.startSc:
Take this small package and deliver it across the island.

It's sensitive so don't get carried away and start playing bumper cars, but we need it there pronto you got it?

Just show up to the shack and we'll take care of it, don't ask any questions.
missions.arrive.italy.blancoAuto.endScre: You got it here in one piece, good job, now scram!
missions.arrive.italy.escursionismo.desc: Treacherous drive along the tops of the Italian mountain ridges!
missions.arrive.italy.escursionismo.star: Head down the narrow dirt path to the paved road and take it across the top of the mountain range to finish on a dirt road on the other side. Be careful there are a lot of blind corners and there are fatal cliffsides on all sides!
missions.arrive.italy.freewayA.title: Freeway Run 'Route A'
missions.arrive.italy.freewayA.descripti: A fun (possibly highspeed!) run along the freeway from one end to the other! You will be driving whichever car you enter the mission with.
missions.arrive.italy.freewayA.startScre: Traverse the entire freeway with light traffic. You have three minutes, but take caution: Damage is being tracked and you will fail if you damage your car too much!
missions.arrive.italy.freewayA.endScreen: Congratulations, you've proven that you can drive on a freeway without destroying your vehicle!
missions.arrive.italy.freewayB.title: Freeway Run 'Route B'
missions.arrive.italy.freewayB.descripti: A fun (possibly highspeed!) run along the freeway from one end to the other!
missions.arrive.italy.freewayB.startScre: Traverse the entire freeway with light traffic. You have three minutes, but take caution: Damage is being tracked and you will fail if you damage your car too much!
missions.arrive.italy.freewayB.endScreen: Congratulations, you've proven that you can drive on a freeway without destroying your vehicle!
missions.arrive.italy.villaVIP.title: Villa VIP Delivery
missions.arrive.italy.villaVIP.descripti: Drive a VIP to their Villa!
missions.arrive.italy.villaVIP.startScre: Drive the VIP to their villa, please drive with care and do not speed or you will fail!
missions.arrive.italy.airport001.title: Airport Chauffeur - Castle
missions.arrive.italy.airport001.descrip: Chauffeur your passenger to the castle.
missions.arrive.italy.airport001.startSc: You've picked up a passenger at the airport, they would like a lift to Castelletto!
missions.arrive.italy.airport001.endScre: It's even more beautiful in person, thanks for the lift!
missions.arrive.italy.airport002.title: Airport Ambulance
missions.arrive.italy.airport002.descrip: Deliver a patient to the hospital.
missions.arrive.italy.airport002.startSc:
The passenger has been overcome by illness on the flight here.

Deliver them to the hospital to get them the care they need!
missions.arrive.italy.airport002.endScre: The patient thanks you and says that they feel better already!
missions.arrive.italy.airport003.title: Airport Chauffeur - Marina
missions.arrive.italy.airport003.descrip: Chauffeur your passenger to the marina.
missions.arrive.italy.airport003.startSc: Your customer has landed and has asked to be delivered to their marina.
missions.arrive.italy.airport003.endScre: Beautiful day to go sailing, thank you!
missions.arrive.italy.airport004.title: Airport Chauffeur - Car Dealership
missions.arrive.italy.airport004.descrip: Chauffeur your passenger to their new car dealership.
missions.arrive.italy.airport004.startSc:
Your customer has just landed and wants to pickup their new vehicle!

Deliver them to the dealership.
missions.arrive.italy.airport005.title: Airport Chauffeur - Interceptor Delivery
missions.arrive.italy.airport005.descrip: Deliver the brand new police interceptor to the police station.
missions.arrive.italy.airport005.startSc:
A brand-new police car has arrived, deliver it to the police station.

Take extreme caution not to damage it en route or you will fail!
missions.arrive.italy.portinoTour.title: Portino to the Top
missions.arrive.italy.portinoTour.descri: A nice and long drive out of Portino to the castle with traffic.
missions.arrive.italy.portinoTour.startS:
Follow the ground markers around and up the backside of Italy, you will arrive to the gas station near the castle!

This drive is longer than usual, the Miramar provides a luxurious though possibly treacherous driving experience on this route! Have fun!
missions.arrive.wcusa.bastionExperience0: Bastion Experience: Certification
Bring the Bastion out to the shop near the motorsports park.
Certification

This lightly used Bastion needs to be re-certified! Our guys are too busy fixing all these old Bruckells, so bring it out to the new shop near the track so they can give it a look over!

Don't forget the motorsports park is right between here and there, so you need to take a route around it.

GPS road markers are not activated for this mission, you'll have to find your own way to your desitination!
Let's get this thing certified and up for sale again!
Bastion Experience: Drop-off
Drop-off a recently-serviced customer car downtown!
Drop-off

A customer has requested that we drop off their Bastion once we have finished servicing it. Bring it out to their downtown residence.

GPS road markers are not activated for this mission, you'll have to find your own way to your desitination!
Nothing beats Bruckell's customer service!
Bastion Experience: Special Drop-off
Take the wild Bruckell Bastion Battlehawk out to the countryside!
Special Drop-off

One of Bruckell's most powerful vehicles has just been in for service. The client is away for the weekend and asked us to drop it off to their countryside home in the hills.

The easiest way to get there is over the highway. You can turn either left or right on the big intersection in front of the dealership and follow that road.

Drive with care, this car means business!

GPS road markers are not activated for this mission, you'll have to find your own way to your desitination!
Keys are in the mailbox, hopefully nobody notices!
Bastion Experience: Police Drop-off
Drop-off the new Police variant!
Police Drop-off

The new Police Variant has been finished, bring it by the police station downtown to let them admire our work!

GPS road markers are not activated for this mission, you'll have to find your own way to your desitination!
People will try to get pulled over by this, just to get a closer look at it!
missions.precisionParking.description:
Park in each marked parking space as quickly as possible. You'll get points based on accuracy and remaining time.
  • You can get up to 20 points per parking.
  • If you finish before the time runs out, you'll get 1 point per remaining second.
  • When a marker has an arrow, you have to park in the correct orientation.
You can get the following medals:
  • Bronze: {{bronzePoints}} Points
  • Silver: {{silverPoints}} Points
  • Gold: {{goldPoints}} Points
Good Luck!
missions.knockAway.intro.description:
• Knock away as many targets as you can within {{time}} seconds.
  • You get {{pointsPerTarget}} points per target.
  • If you finish before the time runs out, you'll get 1 point per remaining second, up to {{maxTimePoints}} Points.
missions.knockAway.intro.moveOnly: Targets need to be moved from their position to count.
missions.knockAway.intro.tipOnly: Targets need to be tipped over to count.
missions.knockAway.intro.moveAndTip: Targets can either be moved from their position or tipped over to count.
missions.knockAway.intro.medals:
You can get the following medals:
  • Bronze: {{bronzePoints}} Points
  • Silver: {{silverPoints}} Points
  • Gold: {{goldPoints}} Points
Good luck!

missions.dragRace.gameplay.description: To compete in the race, you must first go to the start line. Once in the starting position, wait for the traffic light to give the order to start. Drive as fast as you can to the finish line. The vehicle is in realistic behaviour so you will have to manage the gearbox. To do this, use [action=shiftUp] to shift up, [action=shiftDown] to shift down and [action=clutch] to use the clutch. Good luck!

launchercpp.supporttool_safemode_txt:
Launches the game with a temporary Userfolder. Use this mode for diagnostic purposes if you encounter any issues. 

If your game runs normally in Safe Mode, one of the installed mods may be the cause of the issue.

WARNING: Changes made while in Safe Mode will not be saved after the game closes
launchercpp.supporttool_cefnohw_txt:
Intended to troubleshoot issues with the User Interface.

This option will disable the experimental 'Hardware Acceleration' support for UI

NOTE: This option is disabled by default already. Use if you enabled it previously and have issues with your UI
launchercpp.supporttool_verifyhash_txt:
This tool will scan your Gamefolder to ensure that no files are corrupted or missing.

The process can take a few minutes.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_clearcache:
Clear cache
Having problems with textures? Try this then.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_safemode:
Safe mode
Creates a temporary clean user folder.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_cefnohw:
Disable UI hardware acceleration
Use this if you are having problems with the user interface.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_renderdebug:
Enable render debug logs
Use this if you are having problems with crashes in render.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_vulkan:
Vulkan mode
Use unstable Vulkan renderer.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_vulkan_safe_:
Vulkan mode (Safe mode + extra debug data)
Use unstable Vulkan renderer in Safe mode for debugging purposes
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_verifyhash:
Verify Integrity
Verify that all files are downloaded correctly.
launchercpp.supporttool_btn_do:
Support
Need help? Something not working? Let us help you :)
launchercpp.clearcache_msg_normal_txt:
This tool will delete all cached folders and move misplaced files from your Userfolder.

Clearing the cache may help with issues related to missing textures, materials, and similar.

The process can take a few minutes, depending on the size of your Userfolder.
launchercpp.clearcache_msg_deep_txt:
You are about to perform a Deep Cache cleaning!

Only mods and custom configurations will be preserved. Anything else will be moved into a backup folder.

This may help if you are experiencing issues with stock vehicles, levels, materials and similar content.

The process can take a few minutes, depending on the size of your Userfolder.

Do you want to proceed?
launchercpp.clearcache_btn_normal:
Standard cache cleaning
Use to clean up old files.
Preserves mods, settings and most custom files.
launchercpp.clearcache_btn_deep:
Deep cache cleaning
Use for problem with levels, vehicles and textures.
Preserves mods and settings.

supporttool.submit_expanded_info:
The information that will be sent:
 - All available BeamNG log files, installed mods, hashes of installed files
 - Computer information:
  - Software: DirectX SDK version, graphics cards driver information, installed/running programs
  - Hardware: (CPU/GPU/RAM/power info), including anonymous hardware hash
 - Steam user id
